main event: An 18-year-old male observer reported seeing a bright light hovering in the sky at an estimated altitude of 500 feet while driving in Santa Ana, California on August 6, 1965.
interesting points: The light was described as elongated, approximately 50 to 60 feet in length., The sighting lasted for about 3-4 minutes before the light suddenly disappeared., The observer reported the sighting to the Coast Guard Station in Santa Ana., The Air Force classified the sighting as unidentified., The report was part of the historic Project Blue Book investigation.
